revised_title: A New Method for Staunching Blood Using a Healing Liquor
tldr: The author, Monsieur Denis, describes a new method for stopping blood flow using a healing liquor. The liquor is applied to wounds, and it effectively closes the mouths of arteries and veins without causing pain. This method has been tested on animals and has shown promising results, leading to trials on humans. The liquor also has the added benefit of healing wounds without leaving scars or causing suppuration.
